item.title: Privacy Protocol
item.description:
Last Updated: February 8, 2026

1. The Philosophy

We are Privacy Engineers. We believe data is a liability, not an asset. Therefore, we collect zero unnecessary data.

2. The Stack

  • Analytics: We do not use Google Analytics. We use server-side logs that are anonymized.
  • Cookies: This site creates 0 cookies. We do not track you.
  • Hosting: This site is hosted on GitHub Pages. Their privacy policy applies to the infrastructure layer.

3. Your Rights (DPDP Act 2023)

Even though we don’t know who you are, you have the right to ask. Email privacy@syntaxlegal.in to request a data audit of our communications.

item.title: Digital Evidence in India: Navigating the Shift from IEA to BSA
item.description: In an era where technology is deeply embedded in our daily lives, from social media interactions to financial transactions, the footprint we leave behind is increasingly digital. Consequently, “electronic” or “digital” evidence has become the backbone of modern criminal and civil investigations. With the introduction of the Bharatiya Sakshya Adhiniyam, 2023 (BSA), the landscape of how this evidence is appreciated and admitted in Indian courts is undergoing a significant transformation.
